summary: This bill, the 'Preserving Lawful Utilization of Services for Veterans Act of 2025,' addresses fee agreements between veterans and agents/attorneys for initial claims filed with the Department of Veterans Affairs. It clarifies permissible fee structures, sets limits on fees, establishes a standard form, and allows the VA to assess fees. The bill also includes guidelines for agent/attorney recognition, sets penalties for unauthorized fees and violations, and preempts inconsistent state laws.
